name: memoryBank_loadMemoryBank
description:
Loads Memory Bank files from the specified project directory and returns their content combined with the standard Memory Bank instruction prompt.
Use projectPath parameter with an absolute path, and optional memoryBankDir parameter to specify the subdirectory name (default: 'memory-bank').

projectPath.description: Absolute path to the project directory

memoryBankDir.description: Directory name containing Memory Bank files (relative to projectPath)
